Download interrotto. Non può essere ripreso.

Il file scaricato non è stato trovato.
Impossibile completare il download. Spazio insufficiente sulla memoria interna.
Impossibile completare il download. Spazio insufficiente sulla memoria esterna.
Impossibile scaricare. Il supporto esterno non è disponibile.
Questo file è in coda per essere scaricato successivamente.
"Turned off automatic renewal. After your current subscription expires, you'll have to subscribe again to download songs."

Scarica automaticamente i brani che aggiungi ai Preferiti (ad esclusione dei contenuti a pagamento)
Il download dei brani preferiti è disattivato
I brani contrassegnati come \"Preferiti\" saranno scaricati automaticamente via Wi-Fi. Puoi cambiare questa impostazione nelle impostazioni Account nella scheda Locale
Download dei brani solo in Wi-Fi
Impostazioni aggiuntive per i brani preferiti
Sign in to Mi Account and try again.

Enjoy faster download speeds powered by Xunlei

Starting to download… View progress in the Files.

Utilizzo in corso della rete dati mobile per il download dei brani, %s rimanenti
Hai %s s di dati mobili. Utilizzare i dati mobili per scaricare canzoni?
Hai già superato il tuo limite dati di %s. Utilizzare comunque la rete dati per scaricare i brani?
Ti restano solo %s di traffico dati. Utilizzare la rete dati mobile per scaricare i brani?
Stai utilizzando il traffico dati mobile per scaricare i brani. Scaricare comunque?
Download when connected to the internet
Scarica automaticamente i brani che ascolti (ad esclusione dei contenuti a pagamento)

Downloading… View progress in the Files.
Pausa...Continua a scaricare nella barra delle notifiche o sul desktop
Connect to the network to check whether this song is available to you.
Due to copyright restrictions, you must sign in to check whether this song is available to you.
Turned on automatic renewal. Next payment due on %s.
Sync has been turned off due to problems with your account.
Sync has been turned off due to too many sign-in attempts.

Ti rimangono %s di dati su rete mobile. Utilizzare i dati di rete mobile per riprodurre i brani?

Add your Weibo account to the current Mi Account to share. Sign in to share now?

Receive notifications about news and latest releases
Tutti i brani scaricati in questa playlist verranno eliminati dal dispositivo.
Listen and download your favorite songs. View top songs and curated playlists wherever you go!
This song is only available online. Turn on online services in the settings to listen to it.
La disattivazione dei servizi online ha effetti sui servizi VIP e i consigli. Disattivare comunque?
Devi attivare i servizi online per poter utilizzare questa funzionalità. Attivare adesso?
Wait until Music finishes checking storage for songs.

"This song's format isn't supported or the file doesn't exist."

"Use Xunlei Accelerator to speed up downloads? The URL of the download's host will be uploaded to Xunlei's servers. Your Mi Account details will also be uploaded to check if you have any active subscriptions to this service."

Mi Music found album cover and lyrics for this song. Tap \"…\" to edit info.

Update to the latest version of the Music app.

Sync your music across all your devices with Mi Cloud. Using your mobile data connection to sync music will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan’s data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees.
"Devi riavviare l'app Musica affinché questa impostazione abbia effetto."

Now playing in Standard quality. Get Premium Song Pack to enjoy High quality streaming.
Too many requests sent from this device.
"We're discontinuing our current streaming service due to copyright issues. Update to the newest version of the Music app to listen to high quality music."
"We're discontinuing our current streaming service while we resolve copyright issues. Sorry for the inconvenience :("
"We're discontinuing our current streaming service due to copyright issues. Update to the newest version of the Music app to listen to high quality music."

Use mobile data to stream music

Your Music subscription will be renewed automatically the evening of day after tomorrow. Make sure you have enough Mi Credits in your account to complete this payment.

Your Music subscription will be renewed automatically this evening. Make sure you have enough Mi Credits in your account to complete this payment.

"You're no longer connected to Wi-Fi. Using your mobile data connection to complete this download will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan’s data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees."
Welcome to the new version of Mi Music
